item.title: Nathan add a quote by Rilke Rainer Maria
item.description:
"O how all things are far removed and long have passed away. I do believe the star, whose light my face reflects, is dead and has been so for many thousand years.
I had a vision of a passing boat and heard some voices saying disquieting things. I heard a clock strike in some distant house... but in which house?...
I long to quiet my anxious heart and stand beneath the sky's immensity. I long to pray... And one of all the stars must still exist. I do believe that I would know which one alone endured, and which like a white city stands at the ray's end shining in the heavens. " -- Rilke Rainer Maria
